title: Binlog saves unformatted message for errors and warnings (with {0})
body:
Unfortunately it looks like when the BuildEventArgsWriter is writing errors and warnings, it only writes the raw string, and doesn't substitute {0} for argument values.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/679326/131047688-b7622c51-a94a-474d-827c-3c081d5dac3f.png)
